entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 10:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
